common.name: Name
common.immediateChangeReflection: Changes are reflected immediately upon modification
common.discountTotalInfo: Discount applies to the Total Price of the Order. If taxes are included in the price and/or shipping, the discount is calculated after taxes.
common.lineItemInfo: This discount applies to a Line Item, which represents products or services that are defined in the product catalog.
common.targetCustom: To target Custom Line Item instead,
common.areNotTrue: all of these are not true
common.oneOfTrue: at least one of these are true
common.oneOfNotTrue: at least one of these are not true
common.supportedImageFileFormatsInfo: Supported file formats: .jpg, .png, .gif (max. 10 MB per image). Filenames should not contain spaces.
common.pleaseEnterValidImageURL: Please enter a valid image URL
common.title: title
common.extrnalAuth: Enabling external authentication will erase the customer's password permanently.
common.selectOrTypeStorekey: Select or type a store key
common.fieldWarning: This field cannot be updated after creation

product.postCreationStoreValues: Store-based values can be added after the product is created
product.productDisplayNameToCustomer: This is the product name that will be displayed to customers.
product.localizedProductDescription: Describe the product in their corresponding locales
product.uniqueProductKeyToIdentifyProduct: Provide a unique Product key to help identify the product
product.autoSuggestionsSearchImprovement: Improve auto suggestions and search results in your storefront search.
product.productSearchKeywords: Define search keywords for this product.
product.keywordInterpretationChoice: Choose how your keywords will be interpreted by the storefront search engine by selecting one of the.
product.keywordInterpretationDialog: How keywords are interpreted by the search (Tokenizers)
product.keywordSplitOption: Your selected option is used to either split a search keyword up or not..
product.keywordSplitExplanation: Your selected option is used to either split a search keyword up or no  Default (no tokenizer)Use this option when your keyword is made up of several words and the search engine should not split it up into several words. A product with the default option selected in the keyword 'Swiss Army Knife' will be suggested to storefront visitors who search for 'swiss' but not for 'army' or 'knife'.
product.whitespaceOptionExplanation: Use this option when your keyword is made up of several words and the search engine should split it up into several words. A product with the whitespace option and keyword Swiss Army Knife will be suggested to storefront visitors who search for 'swiss', 'army' or 'knife'.
product.seoImprovementDescription: To improve the SEO for this product, set the slug, give the product's web page an appropriate name (Meta title) and describe the product in detail (Meta description).
product.urlSlugDetail: Slugs substitute the non-human readable product id in your Product detail page URL with a user-friendly term. This field's value is unique and may only contain between 2 and 256 alphanumeric characters, underscores, or hyphens (no white space or special characters like ñ, ü, #, %).
product.assignVariantsToProductSelections: Assign Variants part of this Product to Product Selections
product.singleAssignmentPerSelection: Each Product can only be assigned once to each Product Selection
product.discardWhenActive: products discarded from linked stores when active
product.availableWhenActive: products available in linked stores when active
product.saveProductSelectMessage: Save this Product Selection first to assign products to it.
product.allVariantsWithSkuValuesExcept: All variants with SKU values except
product.manageAddInventoryForVariantAndSku: Manage or add inventory for this variant and SKU. Each channel can be assigned to an inventory entry once. It is also possible to have one inventory entry without any associated channel.
product.provideUniquePriceKeyToHelpIdentifyThePr: Provide a unique price key to help identify the price
product.noCustomFieldsForPricesInfo: There are no custom fields defined for prices. To extend the information in your prices, create custom types through the API first.
product.referenceToWarehouseOrSupplierChannel: Reference to a warehouse or supplier channel
product.priceTierSelectionInsteadBasePriceInfo: A price tier is selected instead of the base price, when a certain quantity of the product variant is added to a cart and ordered.
product.imagesPricesInventoryAndStoreBasedAddedA: Images, prices, inventory, and store-based values can be added after you save the whole product
product.thisFieldSupportsHighPrecisionPrices: This field supports high precision prices
product.noProductDiscountAppliedForThisPrice: No product discount applied for this price
product.averageNumberOfDaysForRestock: Average number of days for restock
product.addProductVariantsAndManageAttributeInfo: Add product variants and manage attribute information
product.allProductsRequireAtLeastOneVariant: All products require at least one variant

categories.title: Categories
categories.generalInformationNameCategoryName:
Enter the category name in their corresponding locales. 
This is a mandatory field, please fill in at least one locale.
categories.generalInformationNameDescription: Describe your category in their corresponding locales.
categories.generalInformationNameCategoryKey: Provide a unique category key to help identify the category.
categories.categoryLocationSelectParent: Select a parent category for this branch.
categories.categoryLocationSearchPlaceholder: Search by name, external ID or slug
categories.categoryExternalInfromationDesc: To improve the SEO for this category, set the slug, give the category's web page an appropriate name (Meta title), and describe the category in detail (Meta description).
categories.categoryExternalInfromationUrlDesc: Slugs substitute the category id in the category detail page URL of your webshop with a user-friendly term.This field's value is unique and may only contain between 2 and 256 alphanumeric characters, underscores, or hyphens (no white space or special characters like ñ, ü, #, %).
categories.categoryExternalInfromationMetaTitleDesc: Enter the category meta title in their corresponding locales.
categories.categoryExternalInfromationMetaDescripti: Enter the category meta description in their corresponding locales.
categories.categorygeneralInformationNoCustomFields: There are no custom types defined. To extend the information, create custom types through the API first.
categories.categoryEditManageStoreFrontOrderDesc: Reorder products assigned to this category
categories.categoryEditProductsTableCheckBox: Show only products related to this category

customers.customerKeyDetails: This field is unique and does not allow any value already in use. May only contain between 2 and 256 alphanumeric characters, underscores, or hyphens (no white space or special characters like ñ, ü, #, %).
customers.accountRestriction: This customer may not be able to access to previous orders and some merchants may not be able to view this customer any longer when changes into Account restriction are made.
customers.customfieldText: There are no custom types defined. To extend the information, create custom types through the API first.
customers.fieldUpdates: This field cannot be updated once it is set.
customers.passwordInfo: The password won't be shown again

orders.shippingCostIncTaxStandardShippingMehtod: Shipping cost (incl. tax): Standard shipping method
orders.noBillingAddressWasProvidedThisOrderInfo: No billing address was provided for this order
orders.selectProductsForDeliveryInfo: Select the products and quantities part of this delivery. Deliveries cannot be updated or removed after creation. Parcels can be added afterwards
orders.selectItemsInTheTableToCreateADelivery: Select items in the table to create a delivery:
orders.selectTheItemsShouldBeGroupedTogetherInS: Select the items that should be grouped together in a single return
orders.completeReturnBeforeSavingInfo: All items must be selected before saving this return. Once the return is saved, the information below cannot be edited or modified. However, you can still add custom fields (if available) to the line items in the return for further customization.
orders.assignShipmentAndPaymentStatesToTheLineI: Assign shipment and payment states to the line items in the return.
orders.addCustomFieldsToReturnItems: Custom fields (if available) can be added to the items in the return by clicking on the item details page.
orders.storeCurrencyChangeNotAllowedInfo: It is not possible to change the store or currency at a later step. If the currency or the store are incorrect after this step, you have to abandon the order and start a new one.
orders.orderTrackingOnInventoryInfo: Orders are tracked on inventory with the chance to place an order even if the line item quantity is insufficient.
orders.inventoryTrackingRequiredTrackingOptions: If inventory of the line items is required, select one of the tracking options below.
orders.selectCustomerFromTheTableBelowThatMatch: Select a customer from the table below that matches your chosen currency.
orders.addItemsToYourShoppingCart: Add items to your shopping cart.
orders.searchBySkuOrVariantKey: Search by SKU or Variant Key
orders.noItemsWereAddedToTheCartYet: No items were added to the cart yet.
orders.thereAreNoShippingMethodsThatMatchTheSel: There are no shipping methods that match the selected shipping address.
orders.reviewTheDetailsBelowBeforePlacingTheOrd: Review the details below before placing the order.
orders.toEditOrderDetailsSelectAnyTheAboveSteps: To edit order details select any of the above steps and continue with each step.

account.selectOrganizationToManageTeamsInfo: Select an organization from the table below to manage teams, settings, and Custom Applications.
account.onlySeeOrganizationInWhichYouAreMemberOf: You can only see the organizations in which you are a member of the administrators team.
account.provideTheOrganizationWithName: Provide the organization with a name.
account.viewableProjectsLimitedToAdminTeam: You can only see projects of an organization in which you are a member of the administrators team.
account.howWouldYouLikeToBegin: How would you like to begin?
account.alreadyHaveYourOwnDataReady: Already have your own data ready?
account.perfectletsGetYouStartedWithBlankProject: Perfect, let's get you started with a blank project.
account.dontWantToUploadDataJustYet: Don't want to upload data just yet?
account.getStartedInstantlyWithOurSampleData: Get started instantly with our sample data.
account.projectBelongsToSelectedOrganization: Your project will belong to the organization you choose. You can update your project and organization name at any time, but not your project key.
account.selectTeamFromTheTableBelowToInviteMembe: Select a team from the table below to invite members and manage permissions.
account.permissionsForTeamAdministratorsCannotEd: Permissions for the team of administrators cannot be edited.
account.addExistingMemberOfTheOrganization: Add an existing member of the organization
account.inviteNewMemberByEnteringEmailAddressthe: by typing their name or invite a new member by entering their email address. The new member inherits this team's permissions.
